title: Implicit Bias Awareness and Management Training for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical terminology and basic patient communication knowledge
context.additional_context: Educational environment focusing on diversity and cultural sensitivity in healthcare settings, emphasizing learner-driven experiences through participatory activities and reflective discussions

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three examples of implicit bias occurring in medical settings.
Learners can apply two or more practical strategies to minimize bias impact during patient interactions.
Learners can reflect on their own bias awareness based on peer feedback and develop improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
